SA20n1381:52: yato navamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vartamāno'nuttaradharmabhāṇakatvasaṃpannaḥ sarvasattvāśayasuvidhijña indriyaparamapāramitāprāptaḥ sarvasattvakleśavāsanānusaṃdhisamudghātanakuśalo bhavati tasmāt so'bhisaṃbuddhabodhiḥ supravartitadharmacakra ityucyate |

SA20n1381:55: mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdha yāvadaprameyeṇa ca bodhisattvagaṇena sārdhamiti |

SA20n1381:117: tatra saṃskṛtamucyate yasyotpādo'pi prajñāyatesthitirapi bhaṅgo'pi prajñāyate |

SA20n1381:166: yo yena ca virāgo'sau dharmaḥ satyadvilakṣaṇaḥ ||10 ||

SA20n1381:191: yatra cittamanovijñānāni na pravartante tatra na kaścitparikalpo yena parikalpenāyoniśomanasikuryāt |
SA20n1381:197: duḥkhanirodhanāmnā bhagavannanādikāliko'kṛto'jāto'nutpanno'kṣayaḥ kṣayāpagataḥ nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataḥ prakṛtipariśuddhaḥ sarvakleśakośavinirmukto gaṅgāvālikāvyativṛttairavinirbhāgairacintyairbuddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgatastathāgatadharmakāyo deśitaḥ |
SA20n1381:200: asya khalu duḥkhanirodhasaṃjñitasya tathāgatadharmakāyasya prāptiheturavikalpajñānadarśanabhāvanāmārgastrividhena sādharmyeṇa dinakarasadṛśaḥ veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:205: anuśayato hi bālānāma bhūtamatatsvabhāvaṃ vastu śubhākāreṇa vā nimittaṃ bhavati rāgotpattitaḥ |

SA20n1381:217: sa punareṣa sarvākārakleśakarmajanmasaṃkleśo bālānāmekasya dhātoryathābhūtamajñānādadarśanācca pravartate |
SA20n1381:218: sa ca tathā draṣṭavyo yathā parigaveṣayanna tasya kiṃcinnimittamārambaṇaṃ vā paśyati |
SA20n1381:219: sa yadā na nimittaṃ nārambaṇaṃ vā paśyati tadā bhūtaṃ paśyati |
SA20n1381:221: ya evamasataśca nimittārambaṇasyādarśanāt sataśca yathābhūtasya paramārthasatyasya darśanāt tadubhayoranutkṣepāprakṣepasamatājñānena sarvadharmasamatābhisaṃbodhaḥ so'sya sarvākārasya tattvadarśanavibandhasya pratipakṣo veditavyo yasyodayāditarasyātyantamasaṃgatirasamavadhānaṃ pravartate |
SA20n1381:224: ye samyak pratividhya sarvajagato nairātmyakoṭiṃ śivāṃ
SA20n1381:234: tatra yathāvadbhāvikatā kṛtsnasya pudgaladharmākhyasya jagato yathāvannairātmyakoṭerava gamādveditavyā |
SA20n1381:235: sa cāyamavagamo'tyantādiśāntasvabhāvatayā pudgaladharmāvināśayogena samāsato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate |
SA20n1381:237: tatra yā cittasya prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā yaśca tadupakleśa ityetad dvayamanāsravai dhātau kuśalākuśalayościttayorekecaratvād dvitīyacittānabhisaṃdhānayogena paramaduṣprativedhyam |
SA20n1381:247: atha ca punarbhagavan prakṛtipariśuddhasya cittasyopakleśārtho duṣprativedhyaḥ |
SA20n1381:251: tatra yāvadbhāvikatā sarvajñeyavastuparyantagatayā lokottarayā prajñayā sarvasattveṣvantaśastiryagyonigateṣvapi tathāgatagarbhāstitvadarśanādveditavyā |
SA20n1381:252: tacca darśanaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmāvutpadyate sarvatragāthane dharmadhātuprativedhāt |
SA20n1381:255: ityevamanena prakāreṇa yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca yāvadbhāvikatayā ca yo lokottaramārgāvabodhastadāryāṇāṃ pratyātmamananyasādhāraṇaṃ lokottarajñānadarśanamabhipretam |
SA20n1381:262: itīyaṃ jñānadarśanaśuddhiravinivartanīyabhūmisamārūḍhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāstathāgatajñānadarśanaviśuddherupaniṣadgatatvādanuttarā veditavyā tadanyebhyo vā dāna śīlādibhyo bodhisattvaguṇebhyo madyogādavinivartanīyā bodhisattvāḥ śaraṇa bhūtā bhavanti sarvasattvānāmiti |
SA20n1381:264: na hi jātu paṇḍitā bodhisattvaśrāvakaguṇāntarajñā mahābodhivipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārāpūryamāṇajñānakaruṇāmaṇḍalamaprameyasattvadhātugaṇa-saṃtānāvabhāsapratyupasthitamanuttaratathāgatapūrṇacandra gamanānukūlamārgapratipannaṃ bodhisattvanavacandramutsṛjya prādeśikajñānaniṣṭhāgatamapi tārārūpavat svasaṃtānāvabhāsapratyupasthitaṃ śrāvakaṃ namasyanti |
SA20n1381:276: tatra kenārthena kimadhikṛtya bhagavatā śaraṇatrayaṃ prajñaptam ||

SA20n1381:282: ityanena samāsatastrividhenārthena ṣaṭ pudgalānadhikṛtya prabhedayo bhagavatā saṃvṛtipadasthānena sattvānāmanupūrvanayāvatārārthamimāni trīṇi śaraṇāni deśitāni prajñaptāni |
SA20n1381:297: yaśca tena mārgeṇa nirodho'dhigataḥ so'pi śrāvakanayena pradīpocchedavat kleśaduḥkhābhāvamātraprabhāvitaḥ |
SA20n1381:300: sa ca nityaṃ sabhayastathāgataśaraṇagato niḥsaraṇaparyeṣī śaikṣaḥ sakaraṇīyaḥ pratipannakaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
SA20n1381:302: yasmādarhatāmapi kṣīṇapunarbhavānāmaprahīṇatvādvāsaṃnāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ sarvāsaṃskāreṣu tīvrā bhayasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā bhavati syādyathāpi nāmotkṣiptāsike vadhakapuruṣe tasmātte'pi nātyantasukhaniḥsaraṇamadhigatāḥ |
SA20n1381:304: yathaivā śaraṇāḥ sattvā yena tena bhayena bhītāstatastato niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante tadvadarhatāmapyasti tadbhayaṃ yataste bhayādbhītāstathāgatameva śaraṇamupagacchanti |
SA20n1381:309: evamime dve śaraṇe paryantakāle śaraṇe ityucyete |
SA20n1381:312: anena tu pūrvoktena vidhinānutpādānirodhaprabhāvitasya munervyavadānasatyadvayavirāgadharmakāyatvād dharmakāyaviśuddhiniṣṭhādhigamaparyavasānatvācca traiyānikasya gaṇasya pāramārthikamevātrāṇe'śaraṇe loke'parāntakoṭisamamakṣayaśaraṇaṃ nityaśaraṇaṃ dhruvaśaraṇaṃ yaduta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ |
SA20n1381:316: samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhena ratnasādharmyeṇaitāni buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇi ratnānyucyante |
SA20n1381:324: samalā tathatātha nirmalā vimalāḥ buddhaguṇā jinakriyā |

SA20n1381:332: jinakriyā teṣāmeva daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pratisvamanuttaraṃ karma yadaniṣṭhitamaviratamapratipraśrabdhaṃ bodhisattvavyākaraṇakathāṃ nopacchinatti |
SA20n1381:333: tāni punarimāni catvāri sthānāni yathāsaṃkhyameva caturbhiḥ kāraṇairacintyatvāt sarvajñaviṣayā ityucyante |
SA20n1381:337: tatra samalā tathatā yugapadekakālaṃ viśuddhā ca saṃkliṣṭā cetyacintyametat sthānaṃ gambhīradharmanayādhimuktānāmapi pratyekabuddhānāmagocaraviṣatvāt |
SA20n1381:342: anayordevi dharmayoḥ śrotā tvaṃ vā bhaverathavā mahādharmasamanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ |
SA20n1381:343: śeṣāṇāṃ devi sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tathāgataśraddhāgamanīyā vevaito dharmāviti |
SA20n1381:344: tatra nirmalā tathatā pūrvamalāsaṃkliṣṭā paścādviśuddhetyacintyametat sthānam |
SA20n1381:350: tatra vimalā buddhaguṇāḥ paurvāparyeṇaikāntasaṃkliṣṭāyāmapi pṛthagjanabhūmāvavinirbhāgadharmatayā nirviśiṣṭā vidyanta ityacintyametat sthānam | yat āha |
SA20n1381:351: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yatra tathāgatajñānaṃ na sakalamanupraviṣṭam |
SA20n1381:354: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra trisāhasramahāsahasralokadhātupramāṇaṃ mahāpustaṃ bhavet |
SA20n1381:355: tasmin khalu punarmahāpuste trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ sakalasamāpta ālikhito bhavet |
SA20n1381:371: yathā caikaparamāṇurajasi tanmahāpustaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet tathānyeṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu tatpramāṇānyeva mahāpustānyabhyantarapraviṣṭāni bhaveyuḥ |
SA20n1381:372: atha kaścideva puruṣa utpadyate paṇḍito nipuṇo vyakto medhāvī tatropagamikayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ divyaṃ cāsya cakṣuḥ samantapariśuddhaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavet |
SA20n1381:377: yannvahaṃ mahāvīryabalasthāmnā etatparamāṇurajo bhittvā etanmahāpustaṃ sarvajagadupajīvyaṃ kuryām |
SA20n1381:378: sa mahāvīryabalasthāma saṃjanayitvā sūkṣmeṇa vajreṇa tatparamāṇurajo bhittvā yathābhiprāyaṃ tanmahāpustaṃ sarvajagadupajīvyaṃ kuryāt |
SA20n1381:380: evameva bho jinaputra tathāgatajñānamapramāṇajñānaṃ sarvasattvopajīvyajñānaṃ sarvasattvacittasaṃtāneṣu sakalamanupraviṣṭam |

SA20n1381:384: aho bata ime sattvā yathāvat tathāgatajñānaṃ na prajānanti |

SA20n1381:389: apanīteṣu ca sarvasaṃjñākṛtabandhaneṣu tat tathāgatajñānama pramāṇaṃ bhavati sarvajagadupajīvyamiti |
SA20n1381:390: tatra jinakriyā yugapatsarvatra sarvakālamanābhogenāvikalpato yathāśayeṣu yathāvainayikeṣu sattveṣvakṣūṇamanuguṇaṃ pravartata ityacintyametat sthānam |
SA20n1381:393: api tu kulaputra yattathāgatasya bhūtaṃ tathāgatakarma tadapramāṇamacintyamavijñeyaṃ sarvalokena |
SA20n1381:402: tadanena kulaputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyamacintyaṃ tathāgatakarma samatānugataṃ ca sarvato'navadyaṃ ca triratnavaṃśanupacchettṛ ca |
SA20n1381:403: yatrācintye tathāgatakarmaṇi pratiṣṭhitastathāgata ākāśasvabhāvatāṃ ca kāyasya na vijahāti sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ca darśanaṃ dadāti |
SA20n1381:404: anabhilāpyadharmatāṃ ca vāco na vijahāti yathārutavijñaptyā ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati |
SA20n1381:408: eṣāṃ khalvapi caturṇāmarthapadānāṃ sarvajñeyasaṃgrahamupādāya prathamaṃ boddhavyapadaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA20n1381:412: itīmāni catvāri padānyadhikṛtya hetupratyayabhāvena ratnatrayagotravyavasthānaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1381:413: tatraiṣāṃ caturṇāṃ padānāṃ prathamaṃ lokottaradharmavijatvāt pratyātmayoniśomanasikārasaṃniśrayeṇa tadviśuddhimupādāya triratnotpattiheturanugantavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:416: tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya daśabalādibhirbuddhadharmerdvātriśadākāraṃ tathāgatakarma kurvan parato ghoṣasaṃniśrayeṇa tadviśuddhimupādāya triratnotpattipratyayo'nugantavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:418: ataḥ parameṣāmeva caturṇā padānāmanupūrvamavaśiṣṭena granthena vistaravibhāganirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:419: tatra samalāṃ tathatāmadhikṛtya yaduktaṃ sarvasattvāstathāgatagarbhā iti tat kenārthena |
SA20n1381:427: yaduta sarvasattveṣu tathāgatadharmakāyaparispharaṇārthena tathāgatatathatāvyatibhedārthena tathāgatagotrasaṃbhavārthena ca |
SA20n1381:429: pūrvataraṃ tu yenārthena sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa pravacane sarvākāraṃ tadarthasūcanaṃ bhavati tadapyādhikṛtya nirdekṣyāmi | uddānam |
SA20n1381:436: tadyathā svabhāvārtho hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārtho yogārtho vṛtyartho'vasthāprabhedārthaḥ sarvatragārtho'vikārārtho'bhedārthaśca |
SA20n1381:443: ya ete trayo'tra pūrvamuddiṣṭā eṣu triṣu yathāsaṃkhyameva svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ cārabhya tathāgatadhātościntāmaṇinabhovāriviśuddhiguṇasādharmyaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1381:444: tatra tathāgatadharmakāye tāvaccintitārthasamuddhayādi prabhāvasvabhāvatāṃ svalakṣaṇamārabhya cintāmaṇiratnasādharmyaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1381:447: sarveṣāṃ cātra sadātyantaprakṛtyanupakliṣṭatāṃ prakṛtipariśuddhiṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇāmārabhya tadeva cintāmaṇinabhovāriviśuddhiguṇasādharmyaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1381:453: samāsata ime trividhāḥ sattvāḥ sattvarāśau saṃvidyante |
SA20n1381:456: mokṣamārgapratihatāśa aparinirvāṇagotrakāḥ sattvā ye saṃsāramevecchanti na nirvāṇaṃ tanniyatipatitāścehadhārmikā eva |
SA20n1381:458: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ śāstā na te mama śrāvakāḥ |
SA20n1381:459: tānahaṃ śāriputra tamasastamo'ntaramandhakārān mahāndhakāragāminastamobhūyiṣṭhā iti vadāmi |
SA20n1381:464: ihadhārmikāśca tatsabhāgacaritā eva śrāddhā api durgṛhītagrāhiṇaḥ |
SA20n1381:466: yaduta pudgaladṛṣṭayaśca paramārthānadhimuktā yān prati bhagavatā śūnyatānadhimukto nirviśiṣṭo bhavati tīrthikairityuktam |
SA20n1381:467: śūnyatādṛṣṭayaścābhimānikā yeṣāmiha tadvimokṣamukhe'pi śūnyatāyāṃ mādyamānānāṃ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭirbhavati yānadhikṛtyāha |
SA20n1381:468: varaṃ khalu kāśyapa sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevābhimānikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiriti |
SA20n1381:471: tadubhayānābhilāṣiṇaḥ punarmahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ paramatīkṣṇendriyāḥ sattvā ye nāpi saṃsāramicchanti yathecchantikā nānupāyapatitāstīrthikādivan nāpyupāyapatitāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavat |
SA20n1381:472: api tu saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāpatti mārgapratipannāste bhavantyapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāśayā nirupakliṣṭasaṃsāragataprayogā dṛḍhakaruṇādhyāśayapratiṣṭhitamūlapariśuddhā iti |
SA20n1381:473: tatra ye sattvā bhavābhilāṣiṇa icchantikāstanniyatipatitā ihadhārmikā evocyante mithyātvaniyataḥ sattvarāśiriti |
SA20n1381:475: ye vibhavābhilāṣiṇa upāyapatitāstadubhayānabhilāṣiṇaśca samatāptimārgapratipannāsta ucyatte samyaktvaniyataḥ sattvarāśiriti |
SA20n1381:476: tatra mahāyānasaṃprasthitān sattvānanāvaraṇagāminaḥ sthāpayitvā ya ito'nye sattvāstadyathā |
SA20n1381:480: tadyathā mahāyānadharmapratigha icchantikānāmāvaraṇa yasya pratipakṣo mahāyānadharmādhimuktibhāvanā bodhisattvānām |
SA20n1381:482: saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃjñā duḥkhabhīrutva śrāvakayānikānāmavaraṇaṃ yasya pratipakṣo gaganagañjādisamādhibhāvanā bodhisattvānām |
SA20n1381:483: sattvārthavimukhatā sattvārthanirapekṣatā pratyekabuddhayānikānāmāvaraṇaṃ yasya pratipakṣo mahākaruṇābhāvanā bodhisattvānāmiti |
SA20n1381:484: etaccaturvidhamāvaraṇameṣāṃ caturvidhānāṃ sattvānāṃ yasya pratipakṣānimāṃścaturo'dhimuktyādīn bhāvayitvā bodhisattvā niruttarārthadharmakāyaviśuddhiparamatāmadhigacchantyebhiśca viśuddhisamudāgamakāraṇaiścaturbhiranugatā dharmarājaputrā bhavanti tathāgatakule | kathamiti |
SA20n1381:495: ya ete'dhimuktyādayaścatvāro dharmāstathāgatadhātorviśuddhihetava eṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva samāsataścaturvidhaviparyāsaviparyayapratipakṣeṇa caturākārā tathāgatadharmakāyaguṇapāramitā phalaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA20n1381:496: tatra yā rūpādike vastunyanitye nityamiti saṃjñā |
SA20n1381:508: sa khalveṣa nityādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāgatadharmakāyamadhikṛtyeha viparyāso'bhipreto yasya pratipakṣeṇa caturākārā tathāgatadharmakāyaguṇapāramitā vyavasthāpitā |
SA20n1381:516: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api bhagavan śūnyatājñānenādṛṣṭapūrve sarvajñajñānaviṣaye tathāgatadharmakāye viparyastāḥ |
SA20n1381:517: ye bhagavan sattvāḥ syurbhagavataḥ putrā aurasā nityasaṃjñina ātmasaṃjñinaḥ sukhasaṃjñinaḥ śubhasaṃjñinaste bhagavan sattvāḥ syuraviparyastāḥ |
SA20n1381:520: tathāgatadharmakāya eva bhagavan nityapāramitā sukhapāramitā ātmapāramitā śubhapāramitā |
SA20n1381:521: ye bhagavan sattvāstathāgatadharmakāyamevaṃ paśyanti te samyak paśyanti |
SA20n1381:522: ye samyaka paśyanti te bhagavataḥ putrā aurasā iti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1381:523: āsāṃ punaścatasṛṇāṃ tathāgatadharmakāyaguṇapāramitāyāṃ hetvānupūrvyā pratilomakramo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:524: tatra mahāyānadharmapratihatānāmicchantikānāmaśucisaṃsārābhirativiparyayeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyānadharmādhimuktibhāvanāyāḥ śubhapāramitādhigamaḥ phalaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA20n1381:529: taccāsya nairātmyamanātmalakṣaṇena yathādarśanamavisaṃvāditvāt sarvakālamātmābhipreto nairātmyaṃmevātmani kṛtvā |
SA20n1381:532: sattvārthanirapekṣāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhayānīyānāyamasaṃsargavihārābhirativiṣaparyayeṇa mahākaruṇābhāvanāyāḥ satatasamitamā saṃsārāt sattvārthaphaligodhapariśuddhatvān nityapāramitādhigamaḥ phalaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA20n1381:533: ityetāsāṃ catasṛṇāmadhimuktiprajñāsamādhikaruṇābhāvanānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva caturākāraṃ tathāgatadharmakāye śubhātmasukhanityatvaguṇāpāramitākhyaṃ phalaṃ nirvartyate bodhisattvānām |
SA20n1381:538: āsāṃ punaścatasṛṇāṃ tathāgatadharmakāyaguṇapāramitānāmadhigamāyānāsravadhātusthitānāmapyarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmime catvāraḥ paripanthā bhavanti |
SA20n1381:543: vibhavalakṣaṇaṃ trividhamanomayātmabhāvanirvṛttipratyayā jātipratyayamiva jarāmaraṇamacintyā pāriṇāmikī cyutiriti |
SA20n1381:544: tatra sarvopakleśasaṃniśrayabhūtāyā avidyāvāsabhūmeraprahīṇātvādarhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā vaśitāprāptāśca bodhisattvāḥ sarvakleśamaladaurgandhyavāsanāpakarṣaparyantaśubhapāramitāṃ nādhigacchanti |
SA20n1381:546: tāṃ cāvidyāvāsabhūmimavidyāvāsabhūmipratyayaṃ ca sūkṣmanimittaprapañcasamudācārasamutthāpitamanāsravaṃ karma pratītya manomayaskandhasamudayāt tannirodhamatyantasukhapāramitāṃ nādhigacchanti |
SA20n1381:547: yāvacca nirayaśeṣakleśakarmajanmasaṃkleśanirodhasamudbhūtaṃ tathāgatadhātuṃ na sākṣātkurvanti tāvadacintyapāriṇāmikyāścyu teravigamādatyantānanyathābhāvāṃ nityapāramitāṃ nādhigacchanti |
SA20n1381:552: syādyathāpi nāma bhagavannupādānapratyayāḥ sāsravakarmahetukāstrayo bhavāḥ saṃbhavanti |
SA20n1381:553: evameva bhagavannavidyāvāsabhūmipratyayā anāsravakarmahetukā arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ manomayāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ saṃbhavanti |
SA20n1381:554: āsu bhagavan tisṛṣu bhūmipveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ manomayānāṃ kāyānāṃ saṃbhavāyānāsravasya ca karmaṇo'bhinirvṛttaye pratyayobhavatyavidyāvāsabhūmiriti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1381:555: yata eteṣu triṣu manomayeṣvarhatpratyekabuddhabodhisattvakāyeṣu subhātmasukhanityatvaguṇapāramitā na saṃvidyante tasmāt tathāgatadharmakāya eva nityapāramitā sukhapāramitātmapāramitā śubhapāramitetyukatam |
SA20n1381:560: samasato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ tathāgatadharmakāye śubhapāramitā veditavyā |
SA20n1381:570: anītyāḥ saṃskārā iti ced bhagavan paśyeta sāsya syāducchedadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA20n1381:572: nityaṃ nirvāṇamiti ced bhagavan paśyeta sāsya syācchāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ |
SA20n1381:574: tadanena dharmadhātunayamukhena paramārthataḥ saṃsāra eva nirvāṇamityuktam |
SA20n1381:581: prajñayā hi bodhisattvo'śeṣatṛṣṇānuśayaprahāṇādātmahitāya nirvāṇagatādhyāśayaḥ saṃsāre na pratiṣṭhate'parinirvāṇagotravat |
SA20n1381:582: mahākaruṇayā duḥkhitasattvāparityāgāt parihītāya saṃsāragataprayogo nirvāṇe na pratiṣṭhate śamaikayānagotravat |
SA20n1381:588: tatra purvādhikṛtaṃ karmārthamārabhya pareṇa ślokārdhena kiṃ darśitam |
SA20n1381:590: necchā na prārthanā nāpi prāṇidhirnivṛtau bhavet ||40 ||
SA20n1381:592: tathāgatagarbhaścedbhagavanna syānna syādduḥkhe'pi nirvinna nirvāṇa icchā vā prārthanā vā praṇidhirveti |
SA20n1381:593: tatra samāsato buddhadhātuviśuddhigotraṃ mithyātvaniyatānāmapi sattvānāṃ dvividhakāryapratyupasthāpanaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1381:602: yadapi tat saṃsāre ca duḥkhadoṣadarśanaṃ bhavati nirvāṇe ca sukhānuśaṃsadarśanametadapi śuklāṃśasya pudgalasya gotre sati bhavati nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayamiti |
SA20n1381:603: yadi hi tadgotramantareṇa syādahetukamapratyayaṃ pāpasamucchedayogena tadicchāntikānāmapyaparinirvāṇagotrāṇāṃ syāt |
SA20n1381:604: na ca bhavati tāvadyāvadāgantukamalaviśuddhigotraṃ trayāṇāmanyatamadharmādhimuktiṃ na sa mudānayati satpuruṣasaṃsargādicatuḥśuklasamavadhānayogena |
SA20n1381:606: tatra paścādantaśo mithyātvaniyatasaṃtānānāmapi sattvānāṃ kāyeṣu tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti anāgatahetusaṃjananatayā saṃvardhayanti ca kuśalairdharmeriti |
SA20n1381:607: yatpunaridamuktamicchantiko'tyantamaparinirvāṇadharmeti tan mahāyānadharmapratigha icchantikatve heturiti mahāyānadharmapratighanivartanārthamuktaṃ kālāntarābhiprāyeṇa |
SA20n1381:620: trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva trividhena mahāsamudrasādharmyeṇa tathāgatadhātorhetusamanvāgamamadhikṛtya yogārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:631: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmanena trividhena hetunā tatsaṃbaddhaḥsamanvāgamo yoga ityucyate |
SA20n1381:635: trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyameva trividhena dīpasādharmyeṇa tathāgatadhātoḥ phalasamanvāgamamadhikṛtya yogārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:646: eṣa ca yogārthamārabhya pradīpadṛṣṭānto vistareṇa yathāsūtramanugantavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:659: yadidaṃ tathāgatadhātoḥ sarvadharmatathatāviśuddhisāmānyalakṣaṇamupadiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitādiṣu nirvikalpajñānamukhāvavādamārabhya bodhisattvānāmasmin samāsatastrayāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ pṛthagjanasyātattvadarśina āryasya tattvadarśino viśuddhiniṣṭhāgatasya tathāgatasya tridhā bhinnā pravṛttirveditavyā |
SA20n1381:660: yaduta viparyastāviparyastā samyagaviparyastā niṣprapañcā ca yathākramam |
SA20n1381:664: ataḥ parametameva vṛttyarthamārabhya tadanye catvāro'rthāḥ prabhedanirdeśādeva veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1381:671: iti ye kecidanāsravadhātunirdeśā nānādharmaparyāyamukheṣu bhagavatā vistareṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ sarveta ebhireva samāsataḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ svabhāvahetuphalakarmayogavṛttyarthaḥ saṃgṛhītāstisṛṣvavasthāsu yathākramaṃ trināmanirdeśato nirdiṣṭā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1381:678: sa eva śāriputra dharmakāyaḥ saṃsārastrotoduḥkhanirviṣṇo viraktaḥ sarvakāmaviṣayebhyo daśapāramitāntargataiścaturaśītyā dharmaskandhasahasrairbodhāya caryā caran bodhisattva ityucyate |
SA20n1381:679: sa eva punaḥ śāriputra dharmakāyaḥ sarvakleśakośaparimuktaḥ sarvaduḥkhatikrāntaḥ sarvopakleśamalāpagataḥ śuddho viśuddhaḥ paramapariśuddhadharmatāyāṃ sthitaḥ sarvasattvālokanīyāṃ bhūmimārūḍhaḥ sarvasyāṃ jñeyabhūmāvadvitīyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sthāma prāpto'nāvaraṇadharmāpratihatasarvadharmaiśvaryabalatāmadhigatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha ityucyate |
SA20n1381:686: yāsau pṛthagjanāryasaṃbuddhānāmavikalpacittaprakṛtiḥ sā tisṛṣvavasthāsu yathākramaṃ doṣeṣvapi guṇeṣvapi guṇaviśuddhiniṣṭhāyāmapi sāmānyalakṣaṇatvādākāśamiva mṛdrajatasuvarṇabhājaneṣvanugatānupraviṣṭā samā nirviśiṣṭā prāptā sarvakālam |
SA20n1381:693: etāsteva tisṛṣvavasthāsu tathāgatadhātoḥ sarvatragasyāpi tatsaṃkleśavyavadānābhyāmavikārārthamārabhya caturdaśa ślokāḥ |
SA20n1381:697: dvādaśabhirekena ca ślokena yathākramamaśuddhāvasthāyāmaśuddhaśuddhāvasthāyāṃ ca kleśopakleśadoṣayorāgantukayogāṃccaturdaśamena ślokena suviśuddhāvasthāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāvyativṛttairavinirbhāgairamuktaśiracintyairbuddhaguṇaiḥ prakṛtiyogādākāśadhātoriva paurvāparyeṇa tathāgatadhātoratyantāvikāradharmatā paridīpitā |
SA20n1381:719: na hetuḥ pratyayo nāpi na sāmagrī na codayaḥ |
SA20n1381:722: na jātu sā dyauriva yāti vikriyām |
SA20n1381:728: yadvadayoniśomanaskāravātamaṇḍalasaṃbhūta karmakleśodakarāśiṃ pratītya skandhadhātvāyatanalokanirvṛttyā cittaprakṛtivyomadhātorvivarto na bhavati |
SA20n1381:731: eṣa ca prakṛtiviśuddhimukhaṃ dharmālokamukhamārabhyākāśadṛṣṭānto vistareṇa yathāsūtramanugantavyaḥ |
SA20n1381:744: evameṣāṃ caturṇā dhātūnāṃ pṛthivīdhātorabdhātorvāyudhātorākāśadhātureva balī yo dṛḍho'calo'nupacayo 'napacayo'nutpanno'niruddhaḥ sthitaḥ svarasayogena |
SA20n1381:745: tatra ya ete trayo dhātavasta utpādabhaṅgayuktā anavasthitā acirasthāyinaḥ |
SA20n1381:746: dṛśyata eṣāṃ vikāro na punarākāśadhātoḥ kaścidvikāraḥ |
SA20n1381:751: tatra paścādyo'yoniśomanaskāro ye ca karmakleśā yāni ca skandhadhātvāyatanāni sarva ete dharmā hetupratyayasaṃgṛhītā utpadyante hetupratyayavisāmagrayā nirudhyante |
SA20n1381:752: yā punaḥ sā prakṛtistasyā na heturna pratyayo na sāmagrī notpādo na nirodhaḥ |
SA20n1381:757: tata ucyante sarvadharmā asāramūlā apratiṣṭhānamūlāḥ śuddhamūlā amūlamūlā iti |
SA20n1381:758: uktamaśuddhāvasthāyāmavikāralakṣaṇamārabhya prakṛterākāśadhātusādharmya tadāśritasyāyoniśomanasikārasya karmakleśānāṃ ca hetulakṣaṇamārabhya vāyudhātusādharmyamabdhātusādharmya ca tatprabhavasya skandhadhātvāyatanasya vipākalakṣaṇamārabhya pṛthivīdhātusādharmyam |
SA20n1381:765: lokavyavahāra epa bhagavan mṛta iti vā jāta iti vā |
SA20n1381:767: jāta iti bhagavan navānāmindriyāṇāṃ prādurbhāva eṣa |
SA20n1381:768: na kṣunarbhagavaṃstathāgatagarbho jāyate vā jīryati vā mriyate vā cyavate votpadyate vā ! tatkasmāddheto |
SA20n1381:769: saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaviṣayavyativṛtto bhagavaṃstathāgatagarbho nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvata iti |
SA20n1381:782: kuśalamūlasaṃyojanāddhi bodhisattvoḥ saṃcintyopapattivaśitāsaṃniḥśrayeṇa karuṇayā traidhātuke saṃśliṣyante |
SA20n1381:784: na ca teṣāmime jātyādayo dharmāḥ saṃvidyante |
SA20n1381:788: katame ca te saṃsārapravartakāḥ kuśalamūlasaṃprayuktāḥ kleśāḥ |
SA20n1381:797: ityete sāgaramate kuśalamūlasaṃprayuktāḥ kleśā yairbodhisattvāḥ saṃśliṣyante |
SA20n1381:800: yadā bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tatkena kāraṇena kleśā ityucyante |
SA20n1381:802: tathā hi sāgaramate ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ kleśairbodhisattvāstraidhātuke śliṣyante |
SA20n1381:804: tatra bodhisattvā upāyakauśalena ca kuśalamūlavalānvādhānena ca saṃcintya traidhātuke śliṣyante |
SA20n1381:807: syādyathāpi nāma sāgaramate śreṣṭhino gṛhapatereka putraka iṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ priyo manāpo'prakṛtikūlo darśanena sa ca dārako bālabhāvena nṛtyanneva mīḍhakūpe prapateta |
SA20n1381:808: atha te tasya dārakasya mātṛjñātayaḥ paśyeyustaṃ dārakaṃ mīḍhakūpe prapatitam |
SA20n1381:809: dṛṣṭvā ca gambhīraṃ niśvaseyuḥ śoceyuḥ parideveran |
SA20n1381:811: atha tasya dārakasya pitā taṃ pradeśamāgacchet |
SA20n1381:812: sa paśyetaikaputrakaṃ mīḍhakūpe prapatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpa ekaputrakādhyāśayapremānunoto'jugupsamānastaṃ mīḍhakūpamavaruhyaikaputrakamabhyutkṣipet |
SA20n1381:813: iti hi sāgaramate upamaiṣā kṛtā yāvadevārthasya vijñaptaye |
SA20n1381:818: mātṛjñātaya iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ pudgalānāmetadadhivacanaṃ ye saṃsāraprapatitān sattvān dṛṣṭvā śocanti paridevante na punaḥ śamarthā bhavantyabhyutkṣeptum |
